Software Engineer - Oracle, Cambridge, MA, United States

My team at Oracle is looking for a top notch C++ engineer to help us advance search technology. This is an opportunity to hone your skills and work with cutting edge technology in a fast pace environment. We run as a start up inside the comforts of a large organization. This is not your typical big company job, we're looking for great engineers with that start-up mind set.

See here: https://oracle.taleo.net/careersection/jobdetail.ftl?job=140... for more info on the job.
